column1: omentie is a Quenya word meaning "meeting (of pathways)".
*omentielvo ("of our meeting")In the first edition of The Lord of the Rings
column3: Tolkien used the form omentielmo (amended to omentielvo in the second edition).

column1: *"Elen Sil lúme omentielvo" ("a star shines on the hour of our meeting")
